thread.title: Alan Roberts

author: Alan Roberts
title: Alan Roberts
text:
Dave M has just replaced the front two tyres on my car. I received an email this morning with a time slot for the fitting, Dave called as he was leaving his previous fitting. Arrived right at the beginning of the hour slot, and was done and dusted within 10 minutes.
I made the booking on the Wednesday and a fitting was available on the Thursday. Will use again.
